description.title: About Us
description.text: Welcome to ENLOM — your trusted partner in aviation parts and equipment sales. Based in Bulgaria, we are open to international collaborations, providing high-quality solutions for the aviation industry worldwide.

services.title: Our Services
why_us: A wide range of certified parts
A certified and qualified team with extensive industry experience

secondary.reputation: take pride in our reputation as a reliable supplier, delivering high-quality solutions for the aviation industry. Our priority is customer satisfaction and the dependability of our products.
secondary.contact: Ready to collaborate? Get in touch with us for more information about our services.

fed.title: FED
fed.description: FED is a leading manufacturer of precision equipment and components used in aviation, space, and other industrial sectors. Thanks to our collaboration, clients in Bulgaria gain access to advanced technologies, reliable equipment, and professional support.

aviagrade.title: Avia Grade
aviagrade.description: Avia Grade is a recognized leader in the aviation equipment and technological solutions sector, offering innovative products for the aviation industry. Through our partnership, we provide reliable supply, technical support, and consulting services to clients in Bulgaria.

terem.title: «TEREM-HOLDING» EAD
terem.description: A state-owned company of the Bulgarian Ministry of Defense, specializing in the repair, modernization, and logistical support of aviation equipment, ships, armored vehicles, firearms, artillery and missile systems, ammunition, radar, and communication equipment.

lotn.title: Letecké opravovne Trenčín, a.s. (LOTN)
lotn.description: A company offering maintenance, repair, and modernization services for both aircraft and helicopters in state and civilian aviation.

aviabaltika.title: Aviabaltika Aviation Ltd.
aviabaltika.description: Specializes in the maintenance, repair, and modernization of helicopters in both state and civilian aviation sectors.

spivdruzh.title: Spivdruzhnist Avia Bud LTD
spivdruzh.description: A company specializing in design, engineering, virtual modeling, the production of fiberglass and carbon fiber products, custom manufacturing, composite material repairs, fiberglass works, and painting services.

h3o.title: H3Operations
h3o.description: Specializes in Hot/High/Heavy transportation, with a particular focus on international peacekeeping, humanitarian, and special missions, as well as construction and installation works.

fortop.title: FORTOP Sp. z o. o.
fortop.description: A company focused on the procurement and sale of custom goods, providing logistics support, and implementing foreign trade contracts related to the supply of goods.

haspet.title: Haspet (FZE)
haspet.description: A company with extensive experience in the supply of aviation spare parts.

aeroPartner.title: Aero Partner Ltd
aeroPartner.description: Specializes in the coordination, management, and consulting of projects in the defense industry, as well as the trade, import, and export of special-purpose goods and services, military equipment, spare parts, and components.
